what-is-app.question: What is ScanImg?
what-is-app.answer: ScanImg is a mobile app for recognizing text from photos and documents. Using Google ML Kit technologies, the app allows you to quickly and accurately extract text from images directly on your device.

how-to-use.question: How to use the app?
how-to-use.answer:
1. Tap the 'Scan' button at the bottom of the screen
2. Select source: camera or gallery
3. Take a photo or select an image
4. Wait for processing
5. Copy or save the recognized text

supported-languages.question: What languages are supported?
supported-languages.answer: The app supports text recognition in many languages, including Russian, English, German, French, Spanish, and many others. Recognition accuracy depends on image quality and text clarity.

how-to-scan.question: How to scan?
how-to-scan.answer: Open the app and tap the 'Scan' button at the bottom of the screen. You can choose between camera (to take a new photo) or gallery (to select an existing image). After selecting an image, it will be processed automatically.

scan-quality.question: How to improve recognition quality?
scan-quality.answer:
For best results:
• Ensure the text is well-lit
• Hold the camera parallel to the document
• Avoid shadows and glare
• Ensure all text is in the frame
• Use high-resolution photos

scan-history.question: Where are my scans stored?
scan-history.answer: All your scans are saved in the app history and synchronized with the cloud. You can view them in the 'History' tab. Scans are available from any device where you are logged into your account.

copy-text.question: How to copy recognized text?
copy-text.answer: After scanning is complete, tap the 'Copy' button on the result screen. The text will be copied to the clipboard and you can paste it into any app.

what-are-credits.question: What are tokens (credits)?
what-are-credits.answer: Tokens are the app's internal currency used to pay for scans. Each scan costs a certain number of tokens. You get free tokens upon registration and can purchase additional ones.

how-to-get-credits.question: How to get more tokens?
how-to-get-credits.answer:
You can get tokens in several ways:
• Watching ads (reward for viewing)
• Buying token packages
• Daily bonuses (if available)
• Inviting friends (if available)

credits-cost.question: How much does one scan cost?
credits-cost.answer: One scan usually costs 1 token. The cost may vary depending on document size or text complexity. The exact cost is displayed before scanning begins.

create-account.question: How to create an account?
create-account.answer: When launching the app for the first time, tap 'Register', enter your email, confirm it with the code from the email, and create a password. After that, you can use all app features.

forgot-password.question: Forgot password. What to do?
forgot-password.answer: On the login screen, tap 'Forgot password?' and follow the instructions. A password reset link will be sent to your email. If the problem persists, contact support.

delete-account.question: How to delete account?
delete-account.answer: To delete your account, go to settings, find the 'Delete Account' section and follow the instructions. Warning: this action is irreversible and all your data will be deleted.

app-crashes.question: App crashes. What to do?
app-crashes.answer:
Try the following solutions:
• Restart the app
• Restart your device
• Update the app to the latest version
• Clear app cache
• Reinstall the app (data will be saved in the cloud)

camera-not-working.question: Camera not working
camera-not-working.answer:
Check:
• Camera permissions in device settings
• If the camera is used by another app
• If the camera works in other apps
• If device drivers are updated

slow-recognition.question: Recognition is slow
slow-recognition.answer:
Recognition speed depends on:
• Image size (large images take longer)
• Device performance
• Internet connection quality
• Text complexity

Try reducing photo resolution or using a simpler image.

offline-mode.question: Does the app work offline?
offline-mode.answer: Text recognition works offline as it uses Google ML Kit on the device. However, syncing scan history, purchasing tokens, and other features require an internet connection.
